main.name: Arpit Singh
main.currently: Student at Ascension of our Lord Secondary School
main.bio: I am a hard-working student with an aptitude for developing innovative solutions to complex problems. I see myself as an optimist and self-motivated person who can work in teams contributing to the ever-changing needs of business. I have an excellent academic record and diverse range experiences with modern technologies. I seek to work in the field of software development to build on my knowledge while solving business challenges.
main.contactmessage: Thank you for viewing my portfolio, feel free to reach out to me using email or phone.

resume.skillmessage: Following are some of the technical skills I possess:

education.school: Ascension of our Lord Secondary School

work.title: MUN Delegate
description: Represented the 36th President of the United States, Lyndon B. Johnson, at a Model United Nations conference, significantly contributing to the team's success and earning distinction.
Conducted detailed research on the Rohingya Crisis and navigated scenarios, including a potential nuclear outbreak during the Cold War, resulting in the creation of a highly impactful position paper.
Delivered formal and impromptu speeches to a large group of people.

work.title: Library Support Staff
description: Developed and delivered training sessions for library staff on efficient technology categorization, resulting in a 15% improvement in shelving accuracy and accessibility.
Established and executed a streamlined logistics system for transporting carts with laptops and tablets, ensuring a 20% increase in the prompt availability of technology resources in classrooms.
Implemented a proactive technical support approach, efficiently resolving issues such as password resets and file downloads.

work.title: Mobile Developer
description: Designed, coded, and launched three captivating mobile games with Unity and C#, accumulating over 1000 downloads on the Google Play Store and achieving an 80% user rating.
Implemented performance optimization techniques, reducing app loading times by 25% and enhancing user satisfaction and engagement.
Strategically managed ad revenue and marketing initiatives

skills.name: Technical Skills
skills.description: Python, C++, C#, Java, Unity, G Suite, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Blender, Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code

skills.name: Leadership Skills
skills.description: Problem-solving, Agile, Teamwork, Time Management, Critical thinking, Decisiveness, Creativity

projects.title: Capture the Flag
projects.info: A two-player mobile gaming experience using Unity and C#, including multiple game modes that redefined interactive gaming dynamics.

projects.title: Othello
projects.info: Engineered a portable version of the classic Othello board game, leveraging Unity and C# to bring this timeless strategy game to the mobile gaming platform.
